doc.title: Huling biktima
doc.plot: Unravel the truth in five minutes, Anton, a top investigator finds himself baffled in a case to find an elusive killer. The case gets even more complicated when he links his lover, Lisa to the evidences on the scene of the crime. Then things get out of hand when Lisa, herself walks into the crime scene and is pursued by Anton - only to find out the truth to his investigation.
